entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
